description: You won't waste any time in the kitchen preparing this speedy Spanish-style rice dish with juicy chorizo and chicken pieces. A perfect midweek dinner recipe.
name: Speedy Chorizo & Chicken Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs garlic-infused extra virgin olive oil
540 g microwave lentils, turmeric and brown rice

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup water and pea mix to the pan. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until water is absorbed and rice is tender. Spoon into serving bowls. Serve with lemon wedges.
